title: Describing an NFL Team in One Word
itunes:title: Describing an NFL Team in One Word
description:
A room filled with heroes - Dan Hanzus, Gregg Rosenthal, Marc Sessler & Chris Wesseling – bring you the latest news around the NFL including Sam Darnold signing a deal with the Jets (4:03), OT Brown’s extension with the Seahawks (08:15), and Dez Bryant’s social media meltdown (12:35). The heroes close the show with describing a team in one word while Marc struggles with the rules. (29:50)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
